website_summaries.verdict: The Burnt Rock is one of the functional shoes by Merrell that truly rocks in terms of comfort, fit, and style. Whether one intends to navigate the city or go for a day hike on light trails, this sneaker comes as a reliable companion as it is built with durable materials. This sneaker may be designed to be useful and practical, but Merrell did not fall short in delivering the aesthetic appeal of this silhouette in a lightly built structure. Certainly, this is a good quality sneaker that’s not heavy on the pocket.
pros: The Merrell Burnt Rock is one of the best fitting shoes on the market, according to many consumers
Several buyers were pleased with the kind of comfort this shoe provides, which makes it great for everyday walking
Reviewers were very thrilled that the Burnt Rock is as durable as other Merrell sneakers
Many reviewers found this shoe to be lightweight and ideal for light trail hiking
Consumers were very impressed with the modern and sophisticated design of this sneaker
This shoe truly rocks with a variety of colors available, according to many buyers
An affordable and very functional sneaker, as mentioned by many purchasers
Extremely comfortable with a variety of purposes: for office work, intense labor, urban hiking, and everyday work
Some reviewers bought more than a pair of this shoe as they were very satisfied with the kind of ease it gave their feet
Light and roomy in the toe box
cons: A reviewer noted that the shoe squeaks as its sockliner rubs against the lining once in a while
Few buyers suggested having more cushioning in the forefoot

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and look great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Merrels. Fits right and quality made. These are very breathable, comfortable, and look great. These are my everyday shoes. I don't hike in them. But for walking around town they are great. I also use them as running shoes and am pleased with the support and comfort. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: Got them in and went hiking. There perfect. I play a lot of disc golf and these things are gold. I was using the Merrell moab, but they're really heavy. Not with these though. Would and will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell S

customer_reviews.title: Runs at least half size smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 9.5 size as all my shoes are that size and took it for a hiking vacation. Very uncomfortable and could not use it because it felt like the shoe was size 9. Big toes pinched. Tried to send it back but because of the time elapsed due to the vacation, could not. Stuck with a pair of an expensive wrong size hiking shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lathigra

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty good quality. Fit as expected. I gave a 4 star rating only because it’s more of a sneaker than a hiking shoe. With that being said, they have great grip and feel sturdy. Fast shipping and came neatly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin Land Surveyor

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Merrell shoes. He wears them every day for work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: they looked nice and they both fit my right foot nicely
customer_reviews.text: I returned cause i was sent 2 right foot shoes .... they looked nice and they both fit my right foot nicely....
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin L. Dumdey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like Merrell shoes, these fit well, I wear them for 12hr days at my job in the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: KennyV

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but ran a little small than other ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but ran a little small than other models. There seems to be sometime about all brands of shoes that have mesh toe uppers that give me a problem. Returned for the Pulsate which has a leather toe upper and they fit perfectly. Merrell makes great shoes. My other ones have proven to be rugged and durable and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! They fit well and are comfortable on short ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! They fit well and are comfortable on short hikes. First pair of shoes bought on line too :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sized at least half a size too small. Very disappointing, because Merrells usually work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
